data.text: I am saying all this from my own family experience because, yes, there is huge ex-con stigma within dynamics of the family where they cut off contact once released, so, again, go buy your makeup and Ye stuff.

Yet another thing to shove in the face of the oppressed for political games, and I hope the Johnson family is getting counseling for transition because, yes, there is a family stigma attached of housing ex-inmates,so I am happy for Alice but cynical for the transparency of games
Yep and ppl will consume these celebrities and their products because of “good deed” in fighting for black ppl. Give me a break.

While I know there are faceless prison advocates and non profit orgs who have been pleading pardons over the years, I am cynical asf when ppl with fame get full credit for decades of hardwork and challenges

Like the Democrats did in the past, considering No. 45 was at one time a Democrat, he will play out identity politics to win votes so unless Democrats come up with a candidate who is just as vocal as No. 45, I see another 4 years

And when there is a prison system for profit in place, to oppress marginalized demographics, you darn skippy No. 45 will use PR tactics to “win” votes from marginalized people who will hop on after this commutation. Just watch. I see 2020 being another headache

So while Kim Kardashian is getting credit now when she wouldn’t step foot on the other side of Los Angeles please take note, this administration and the GOP riding along on this crap, don’t care or do Diddley-Do-Diddley Squat on criminal justice or prison reform.

When you are commuted from a prison sentence, meaning shortening of time, as an ex-inmate, you don’t get financial aid for education or access to low income housing.  You are really isolated and yes you have to check that box on every job application that you served time
When you are pardoned from a prison sentence, the records are clear, meaning at least you get a second chance even if there is stigma attached as far as resources
Being Commuted vs Pardoned is different.
